titles.title: A bill to provide authorization of appropriations for the Federal Emergency Food and Shelter Program for the fiscal years 1995 and 1996.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7245-7246)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 544.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 6/21/1994--Introduced. Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to authorize appropriations for the emergency food and shelter program.
